drop EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE DeltaLakeStorage

CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE DeltaLakeStorage
WITH ( LOCATION = 'https://ftr23m5xeeoklumapoc.dfs.core.windows.net' );
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT DeltaLakeFormat
WITH (  
    FORMAT_TYPE = DELTA
);
GO
/*
SELECT TOP 10 *
FROM OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'covid',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'DeltaLakeStorage',
        FORMAT = 'delta'
    ) as rows;
*/
SELECT TOP 10 *
FROM OPENROWSET(
    BULK 'https://ftr23m5xeeoklumapoc.dfs.core.windows.net/dlsftrpocfs1/deltataxidata/TripMonthly/',
    FORMAT = 'delta') as rows;

SELECT TOP 10 *
FROM dELTAtAXItRIP


CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE DeltaTaxiTripMonthly (
	[Year] nvarchar(55),
	[DateID] int,
	[MedallionID] int,
	[HackneyLicenseID] int,
	[PickupTimeID] int,
	[DropoffTimeID] int,
	[PickupGeographyID] int,
	[DropoffGeographyID] int,
	[PickupLatitude] float,
	[PickupLongitude] float,
	[PickupLatLong] nvarchar(55),
	[DropoffLatitude] float,
	[DropoffLongitude] float,
	[DropoffLatLong] nvarchar(55),
	[PassengerCount] int,
	[TripDurationSeconds] int,
	[TripDistanceMiles] float,
	[PaymentType] nvarchar(55),
	[FareAmount] numeric(19,4),
	[SurchargeAmount] numeric(19,4),
	[TaxAmount] numeric(19,4),
	[TipAmount] numeric(19,4),
	[TollsAmount] numeric(19,4),
	[TotalAmount] numeric(19,4)
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = '/dlsftrpocfs1/deltataxidata/TripMonthly/*.*',
	DATA_SOURCE = DeltaLakeStorage,
	FILE_FORMAT = DeltaLakeFormat
	)
GO



CREATE OR ALTER VIEW YellowTaxiView
AS SELECT *
FROM  
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK '/deltataxidata/TripMonthly/',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'DeltaLakeStorage',
        FORMAT='DELTA'
    ) nyc



SELECT TOP 10 *
from YellowTaxiView
